oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural Circular
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Circulars; Agricultural productivity
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Circular distributed by the United States Patent Office in 1851 for the purpose of gathering data on farming practices in the United States.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Library Special Collections
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The U. S. Patent Office published an annual report containing pertinent information on field cultivation, animal husbandry techniques, and other useful data for agriculturalists.
